    public class ImageryCaptureTask

      • onStartCapture

        public boolean onStartCapture​(int tileCount,
                              int tw,
                              int th,
                              int fw,
                              int fh)
        Description copied from interface: TileCapture.Callback
        Capture process started - this is where you would create your destination file based on the arguments provided
        Parameters:
        tileCount - The total number of tiles being captured
        tw - Tile width in pixels
        th - Tile height in pixels
        fw - Full capture width in pixels
        fh - Full capture height in pixels
        Returns:
        True to continue, false to stop

      • onCaptureTile

        public boolean onCaptureTile​(android.graphics.Bitmap tile,
                             int tileNum,
                             int tileColumn,
                             int tileRow)
        Description copied from interface: TileCapture.Callback
        Tile has been captured
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile bitmap
        tileNum - The tile number (out of the total number of tiles)
        tileColumn - Tile column
        tileRow - Tile row
        Returns:
        True to continue, false to stop
